description: You'll love this traybake. With roast beef, brown rice, sweet truss tomatoes and olives, this tasty traybake recipe is a true dinner winner.
name: Herbed Beef & Rice Traybake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500 g Woolworths COOK beef rump mini roast with mustard & herbs

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, combine yoghurt, mint and remaining garlic in a small bowl. Season with pepper. Serve beef and rice traybake with mint yoghurt.
